00010 // Whether to reuse freed memory (yes, you want to do this)
00011 #define RECYCLE 1
00012 // Whether to report memory allocations and deallocations
00013 #define TRACE_ALLOCS 0
00014 // Whether to include extra debugging information (slightly slower, bigger heap)
00015 #define CHECK_MEM 0

00108 
00109 // object_cell
00110 //
00111 // "free_space" is a table of free blocks.  We round the size up using
00112 // object_cell() into 64 discrete sizes, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 32 ...
00113 //
00114 // Returns the cell number, and also rounds req_size up to the cell size
00115 
00116 // TODO: Must align at 8-byte boundary!!!
00117 
00118 inline int object_cell(size_t &req_size)
00119 {
00120     int cell=0;
00121     size_t cell_size=2*sizeof(void*);
00122 
00123     // TODO: A more efficient way of extracting just the top two bits of a number
00124 
00125     while (cell<64) // NB that's just 32 bits!
00126     {
00127         size_t s0 = cell_size>>1;
00128 
00129         if (req_size <= cell_size)
00130         {
00131             req_size = cell_size;
00132             return cell;
00133         }
00134         cell++;
00135         cell_size += s0;
00136 
00137         if (req_size <= cell_size)
00138         {
00139             req_size = cell_size;
00140             return cell;
00141         }
00142         cell++;
00143         cell_size += s0;
00144     }
00145 
00146     return 0;   // Failure
00147 }

00151 PersistImpl::PersistImpl()
00152 {
00153     mappedData = 0;
00154     num_mapped_blocks=0;
00155     flags=0;
00156 }
00157 
00158 PersistImpl::~PersistImpl()
00159 {
00160     close();
00161 }
00162 
00163 void PersistImpl::roundToPageSize(size_t &size)
00164 {
00165     const size_t mask = pageSize-1;
00166     if (size&mask)
00167     {
00168         size &= ~mask;
00169         size += pageSize;
00170     }
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 void PersistImpl::open(const char *filename, int uid, int f, size_t init_size)
00175 {
00176     flags = f;
00177 
00178     try
00179     {
00180         openFile(filename);
00181 
00182         mapBase();
00183 
00184         if (!mappedData->created)
00185         {
00186             // First time creation
00187 
00188             initialize_map();
00189             mappedData->uid = uid;
00190             if (init_size)
00191                 addBlock(init_size);
00192         }
00193         else
00194         {
00195             // Already created
00196             if (uid != mappedData->uid)
00197                 throw std::bad_alloc();
00198 
00199             num_mapped_blocks = 0;
00200             mapBlocks();
00201         }
00202     }
00203     catch (...)
00204     {
00205         // Could not open the file
00206         close();
00207 
00208         mappedData = 0;  // TODO: Done by close
00209         throw;
00210     }
00211 }
00212 
00213 void PersistImpl::close()
00214 {
00215     unmapAll();
00216     closeFile();
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 void PersistImpl::mapBase()
00221 {
00222     mappedData = static_cast<MappedData*>(map(0, sizeof(MappedData)));
00223 }
00224 
00225 void PersistImpl::mapBlocks()
00226 {
00227     int n = mappedData->num_mapped_blocks;
00228 
00229     for (int b=num_mapped_blocks; b<n; ++b)
00230     {
00231         MappedData::mapped_block &block = mappedData->blocks[b];
00232         map(block.file_offset, block.size, block.base);
00233     }
00234 
00235     num_mapped_blocks = n;
00236 }
00237 
00238 void PersistImpl::initialize_map()
00239 {
00240     new(mappedData) MappedData();
00241 
00242     mappedData->auto_grow = (flags&auto_grow)!=0;
00243 
00244     mappedData->file_length = sizeof(MappedData);
00245     roundToPageSize(mappedData->file_length);
00246 }
00247 
00248 void PersistImpl::unmapAll()
00249 {
00250     if (mappedData)
00251     {
00252         for (int b=0; b<mappedData->num_mapped_blocks; ++b)
00253         {
00254             MappedData::mapped_block &block = mappedData->blocks[b];
00255             unmap(block.base, block.size);
00256         }
00257 
00258         unmap(mappedData, sizeof(MappedData));
00259         mappedData = 0;
00260     }
00261 
00262     num_mapped_blocks=0;
00263 }
00264 
00265 void *PersistImpl::malloc(size_t size)
00266 {
00267     if (!mappedData) return 0;
00268 
00269     // if(size==0) return mappedData->top;  // A valid address?  TODO
00270 
00271     lockMem();
00272 
00273     int free_cell = object_cell(size);
00274 
00275 #if RECYCLE
00276     if (mappedData->free_space[free_cell])
00277     {
00278         // We have a free cell of the desired size
00279 
00280         void *block = mappedData->free_space[free_cell];
00281         mappedData->free_space[free_cell] = *(void**)block;
00282 
00283 #if CHECK_MEM
00284         ((int*)block)[-1] = size;
00285 #endif
00286 
00287 #if TRACE_ALLOCS
00288         std::cout << " +" << block << "(" << size << ")";
00289 #endif
00290 
00291         unlockMem();
00292         return block;
00293     }
00294 #endif
00295 
00296 #if CHECK_MEM
00297     *(int*)mappedData->top = size;
00298     mappedData->top += sizeof(int);
00299 #endif
00300 
00301     void *t = mappedData->top;
00302 
00303     if (mappedData->top + size > mappedData->end && mappedData->auto_grow)
00304     {
00305         // We have run out of mapped memory
00306         addBlock(size);
00307         t = mappedData->top;
00308     }
00309 
00310 
00311     if (mappedData->top + size > mappedData->end)
00312     {
00313         // We were unable to extend the mapped memory
00314         unlockMem();
00315         return 0;  // Failure
00316     }
00317 
00318     mappedData->top += size;
00319 
00320 #if TRACE_ALLOCS
00321     std::cout << " +" << t << "(" << size << ")";
00322 #endif
00323 
00324     unlockMem();
00325     return t;
00326 }
00327 
00328 void PersistImpl::free(void *block)
00329 {
00330     // TODO: Not implemented...
00331 }
00332 
00333 void PersistImpl::free(void* block, size_t size)
00334 {
00335     lockMem();
00336 
00337 #if TRACE_ALLOCS
00338     std::cout << " -" << block << "(" << size << ")";
00339 #endif
00340     if (size==0) return; // Do nothing
00341 
00342     if (block <mappedData || block >=mappedData->end)
00343     {
00344         // We have attempted to "free" data not allocated by this memory manager
00345         // This is a serious fault, but we carry on
00346 
00347         std::cout << "Block out of range!\n";  // This is a serious error!
00348 
00349         // This happens in basic_string...
00350         unlockMem();
00351         return;
00352     }
00353 
00354     // This assertion no longer applies...
00355     // assert(block>=mappedData && block<mappedData->end);
00356     // This means that the address is not managed by this heap!
00357 
00358 #if CHECK_MEM
00359     assert(((int*)block)[-1] == size);
00360     ((int*)block)[-1] = 0;  // This is now DEAD!
00361 #endif
00362 
00363 #if RECYCLE   // Enable this to enable block to be reused
00364     int free_cell = object_cell(size);
00365     // free_cell is the cell number for blocks of size "size"
00366 
00367     // Add the free block to the linked list in free_space
00368     *(void**)block = mappedData->free_space[free_cell];
00369     mappedData->free_space[free_cell] = block;
00370 #endif
00371 
00372     unlockMem();
00373 }
00374 
00375 void *PersistImpl::root() const
00376 {
00377     if (!mappedData) return 0; // Failed
00378 
00379 #if CHECK_MEM
00380     // return (int*)mappedData->root + 1;
00381     return (int*)mappedData->blocks[0].base + 1;
00382 #endif
00383 
00384     return mappedData->blocks[0].base;
00385     // return mappedData->root;
00386 }
00387 
00388 bool PersistImpl::empty() const
00389 {
00390     if (!mappedData) return true;
00391     return mappedData->top == mappedData->bottom;
00392 }
00393 
00394 bool PersistImpl::usable() const
00395 {
00396     return mappedData != 0;
00397 }
00398 
00399 void PersistImpl::updateMappedBlocks()
00400 {
00401     if (num_mapped_blocks != mappedData->num_mapped_blocks)
00402     {
00403         mapBlocks();
00404     }
00405 }
00406 
00407 void PersistImpl::addBlock(size_t size)
00408 {
00409     if (size < MappedData::block_size) size = MappedData::block_size;
00410 
00411     roundToPageSize(size);
00412 
00413     remapFile(mappedData->file_length + size);
00414 
00415     void *base = map(mappedData->file_length, size, 0);
00416 
00417     MappedData::mapped_block &block = mappedData->blocks[mappedData->num_mapped_blocks];
00418 
00419     block.base = base;
00420     block.file_offset = mappedData->file_length;
00421     block.size = size;
00422 
00423     mappedData->file_length += size;
00424     mappedData->num_mapped_blocks++;
00425     num_mapped_blocks++;
00426 
00427     mappedData->top = (char*)base;
00428     mappedData->bottom = base;
00429     mappedData->end = (char*)base + size;
00430 }
